knimeNode.name: Brat Document Writer
knimeNode.shortDescription: Writes input documents into two files (.txt and .ann), which are readable by the annotation tool Brat.

fullDescription.intro: This node takes the documents in the selected column and writes them, each as two files (.txt and .ann), into the selected directory. The .txt file will contain the document text, and the .ann file the terms and tags in the document. Both files will be named after the table's row keys. The created files can then be imported into the annotation tool Brat.
fullDescription.option: Choose if existing files should be overwritten here. If this option is unchecked, the node will fail if a file already exists.

ports.inPort: The input table which contains the documents.
